body_html:
@suiyuan2009 It's pity but Nesterov Momentum doesn't work with embedding matrix on GPU. The error: "Cannot assign a device to node 'gradients/networks/transpose_1_grad/transpose/x': Could not satisfy explicit device specification '/device:GPU:0' because no supported kernel for GPU devices is available."

Maybe you can fix it?

body:
@suiyuan2009 It's pity but Nesterov Momentum doesn't work with embedding matrix on GPU. The error: "Cannot assign a device to node 'gradients/networks/transpose_1_grad/transpose/x': Could not satisfy explicit device specification '/device:GPU:0' because no supported kernel for GPU devices is available."

Maybe you can fix it?
